resources.string: Автоматическое монтирование java-библиотеки при запуске сервера.
Запросить root командой «ku.sud» вместо «su», работает только с KingRoot.
Firebase Analytics can help me to improve this app and let me know if there\'s anything wrong,if you really mind this you can turn it off.
Поддержка цветов консоли и стилев шрифта. Повлияет на производительность.
Извените,all ABIs this app supported isn\'t match with your device,we can\'t install %binary on this device.\nYou can continue anyway but this app may not proper functioning.

Your server isn't started correctly because it's stopped in 3 seconds.
This might caused by following reasons:

· Server software crashed
· Device memory too low
· Device ABI not supported or you are using a wrong binary
· You shut down the server manually

All reasons above CANNOT BE SOLVED BY THE DEVELOPER OF POCKET SERVER,please contact THE DEVELOPER OF SERVER SOFTWARE THAT YOU ARE USING for help.
LEAVING 1 STAR REVIEW TAKES NO EFFECT

If you don't agree the following text please click "Exit" and uninstall this app.
This app is A TOOL FOR DEVELOPERS INSTEAD OF A GAME SERVER.

Bug reporting:
· Email to:fengberd@gmail.com
· Click the copyright label and submit a issue.
· Click "Report" button when you see a crash dialog.

* LEAVING 1 STAR REVIEW WITH CONTENT LIKE "s**t" TAKES NO EFFECT

If you meet any problems below,I CANNOT FIX THEM:
· "Where is the server folder?"–>/sdcard/PocketMine or /sdcard/Nukkit
· "Why it's so lagggg even freezing my system?"–>Caused by your device,it's just a phone or tablet instead of a server with E5–2699...
· "Login Timeout" or "XXX Error" in console->Caused by server softwares
· Some strange output like "No such file or directory" in console->This is something like ABI not supported,it's caused by your device.
· ABI Not Supported dialog->Only supported x86 and armeabi devices.
· "How do I get the IP address and port for my server?","I can't join the server!!!S**t app!!!"->Just uninstall it,I'll not reply you in Google Play.
· PocketMine server stopped suddenly with no extra messages->Caused by server softwares or PHP binaries

This app is a platform to let you run "Server Software" on your devices,"Server Software" isn't developed by me,you should contact the developer of them to fix these problems.
As a student I CANNOT update this app frequently,please be patient.

IF THIS APP DOES NOT WORK AND YOU ARE NOT INTERESTED IN HELP ME TO FIX IT,JUST CLICK THE UNINSTALL BUTTON
Поместите PocketMine-MP.phar или же папку src в /sdcard/PocketMine

Install php manually is an advanced action.You should choose the php binary by yourself,don\'t choose any binary provided by someone you can\'t trust,it may be harmful for you device.\nIf you have an archived PHP binary,please extract it first.
